Reviews.Content: average size comfortable barely hotel sightseeing daynight staff nice front desk help elevator helpful luggage hallways clean hotel located minutes center la ramblas near metros allows city easily quickly quick metro ride beaches barceloneta happy stay definitely stay hotel

Reviews.Content: looking budget hotel excellent location choice hotel 2min walk la rambla situated quarter el raval nice restaurants tapas bars bakery shops contemporary museum practically acoustic isolation dont mind dont hesitate book

Reviews.Title: “Excellant value for money”

Reviews.Content: fantastic location excellant value money clean simple offers simple pastries tea coffee breakfast ideal city break minutes las ramblas restaurants bars shops doorstep 24 hrs reception friendly staff safe boxes available rent hot water available aircondition added bonus downside noisy selfish guests realise guests hotel asleep fault hotel tight budget simple clean stay location highly recommend
